argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | add.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | add.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 |  | add.3 | |- C e. CC |
| 4 |  | add4.4 | |- D e. CC |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_add4i | |- ( ( A + B ) + ( C + D ) ) = ( ( A + C ) + ( B + D ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 4 | #P_addcomi | |- ( B + D ) = ( D + B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( A + C ) + ( B + D ) ) = ( ( A + C ) + ( D + B ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- ( ( A + B ) + ( C + D ) ) = ( ( A + C ) + ( D + B ) ) |
\
 Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-1999.) Obsolete version of ~ add42i as of 25-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
